name: 枪械突击
abstract: 免费多人联机射击游戏

detail.app_release_note:
Patch Notes 0.8.214 - Unearth Murkwood Battle Royale in a Halloween Extravaganza!

Halloween has taken over Piratebay, and you're invited! Claim your free 250 RC pumpkin loot and enter the mysterious Murkwood Battle Royale, our brand-new map straight out of Season 4's haunting Deadwind region.

- New: Murkwood Battle Royale map (work in progress)
- New: Free 250 RC loot pumpkin
- New: Halloween themed Piratebay
- New: Spectate in Battle Royale games (private games only)
- New: Wrist Map can zoom in and out by tapping it with your right hand
- Update: Battle Royale weapon upgrades further tuned
- Update: Network optimizations
- Update: Map vote screen modified to make a little easier to see what is being voted
- Update: Battle Royale heartbeat now only beats when there is 1 player alive on the team (sorry, this was annoying)
- Fix: Weapon drop bar stuck on screen
- Fix: Daily 5 RC coin state fixed
